bio:treatment.description: Chelicerae with three teeth on promargin (middle tooth larger), four on retromargin. Carapace very wide in front (fig. 97B, D), length 4.00 mm, width 3.13 mm. ovules 2-4, glabrous, lamina ovate 25-4 mm long, 15-25 mm wide, deeply pectinate, with 14-22 soft lateral spines 15-25 mm long, 2.5 mm wide, apical spine not distinct from lateral spines.
